long_description: The bright and dramatic colors of this series have made them an all-time favorite of Panther Martin fisherman. The black blade and body with yellow dots and yellow blade and body with red dots are the most popular. Effective on many species of fish including trout, bass, walleye and northern pike and in larger sizes, muskie.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
